org.apache.logging.log4j.core.config

接口 ConfigurationAware

  • 所有已知实现类:
    AbstractConfigurationAwareLookup, Interpolator, Log4jLookup, StrSubstitutor

    public interface ConfigurationAware
    Indicates that a class requests the current Configuration to be injected.
    从以下版本开始:
    2.6

    • 方法概要

      所有方法 实例方法 抽象方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      void setConfiguration(Configuration configuration)
      Injects the current Configuration into this object.

    • 方法详细资料

      • setConfiguration

        void setConfiguration(Configuration configuration)
        Injects the current Configuration into this object.

        configuration - the current Configuration
